_header: With timorous heart and trembling hand of dread

_description: The Courte of Love — 1422 lines in rhyme royal stanzas

CamTCC599.First Lines:
with tymeros hert and tremlyng hand of dredeOf cunnyng naked bare
                    of eloquenceVnto the flour of þooȝt in womanhedeI write as
                    he that none intelligence…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…She smote me thrugh the harte as bliveAnd Venus yet I thanke
                    I am alive
